title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 15 December 2008 - XWiki
content:
xwikibot - (15/12/2008 04:26): Plugins.DocumentTreePlugin was modified by xwiki:XWiki.jeremi (Added comment) - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Plugins/DocumentTreePlugin  
asyd - (15/12/2008 09:19): vmassol\_: http://hub.opensolaris.org/  
vmassol\_ - (15/12/2008 09:48): asyd: strange they're using the old skin  
asyd - (15/12/2008 09:49): yeah I notice, I send an email to the one who manage this site to propose my (little) hel  
vmassol\_ - (15/12/2008 10:04): great thanks asyd   
xwikibot - (15/12/2008 10:29): Community.HallOfFame was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Adding Asiri) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/HallOfFame  
xwikibot - (15/12/2008 10:33): XWiki.XWikiCommittersGroup was modified by xwiki:XWiki.jvdrean (Deleted object) - http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/XWikiCommittersGroup  
xwikibot - (15/12/2008 10:33): XWiki.XWikiCommittersGroup was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Added object) - http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/XWikiCommittersGroup  
xwikibot - (15/12/2008 10:33): XWiki.XWikiCommittersGroup was modified by xwiki:XWiki.VincentMassol (Added Asiri) - http://enterprise.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/XWikiCommittersGroup  
asyd - (15/12/2008 10:46): oh, btw, I found a strange (at least, for me) behavior when using setCacheDuraction and set($showhistory = "no") when I edit the page and save it, the history doens't appears . But I reload the page the history come backs.  
asyd - (15/12/2008 10:47): (1.6.1)  
vmassol - (15/12/2008 11:05): asyd: looks like a bug can you raise a jira?  
asyd - (15/12/2008 11:08): ok
